lead_paragraph: One minute after Emmanuel Adebayor appeared to put Arsenal in the European Champions League semifinals, Steve Gerrard converted a tie-breaking penalty kick to give Liverpool a spot in the final four. Liverpool’s 4-2 victory capped the 5-3 aggregate victory. Liverpool will meet Chelsea, which defeated visiting Fenerbahce by 2-0 to win, 3-2.
